name: Merit Scholarship
eligibility: Awarded to students who score 90% or above in their previous academic year.

name: OBC Scholarship
eligibility: OBC category students with 60% or above in the previous exam and household income less than ₹6 Lakh per year.

name: SC/ST Scholarship
eligibility: SC/ST category students scoring 50% or above in the previous examination.

name: General Scholarship
eligibility: General category students scoring 65% or above in the previous academic year.

name: Rajasthan State Engineering Scholarship
eligibility: Awarded to students enrolled in government engineering colleges of Rajasthan with minimum 75% marks in 12th board exams.

name: Tech Excellence Scholarship
eligibility: Students excelling in coding competitions, robotics, or innovation projects recognized at state or national level.

name: Women in Engineering Scholarship
eligibility: Female students enrolled in engineering courses with at least 60% marks in previous exams.

name: Minority Community Scholarship
eligibility: Students from minority communities with minimum 55% marks and household income below ₹5 Lakh per year.

name: Rural Talent Scholarship
eligibility: Students from rural areas demonstrating academic excellence (60%+) and participation in social initiatives.

name: Sports and Cultural Scholarship
eligibility: Students actively participating in sports or cultural activities at state or national level.
